original: Lindblad, Gustaf (Gösta) Fredrik, fil. dr, kktor, Halmstad, f. 4/3/88 i Nässja, östergötl. 1., av ing. Carl Otto L. o. Clara Blycker. G. 21 m. Signe Helgesson. Barn: Inge f. 22, Torgny 26, Kerstin 28. — Stud:ex. i Hälsingborg 06, fil. kand. i Lund 10, fil. mag. 12, fil. lic. 14, fil. dr 19. Res. i Tyskl. 12 o. 14. Lär. v. Lunds priv. elemrsk. o. v. Lunds fullst. lärov. f. fl. 19-21, utn. lektor v. Hudiksvalls h. a. 1. 20, rektor v. Eslövs h. samsk. 21-30, lektor v. Halmstads h. a. 1. fr. 30. Eftergranskare i realexamen där. E. o. aman. v. Lunds univrbibl. 12-15, kurator f. Hälsingborgs-Landskrona nat. i Lund 12-13, insp. f. Eslövs stads yr-kessk. 23-31, led. av styr. f. komm. mellansk. rektorsfören. 23-29, ordf. 24-29, ordf. i Eslövs gymn:förb. 21-31, styrrled. i Skånes gymniförb. 28-31, ied. av styr. f. Eslövs stadsbibi. 28-31, ordf. 29-31, i styr. f. centr :bibl. i Halmstad sed. 32, ordf. fr. 37, ordf. i Halmstads human. förb. fr. 34, v. ordf. i fören. Norden i Halmstad sed. 43. Preses i Halmstads Rotarykl. 44-45. Skr.: Abr. Sahlstedt o. den sv. subst:-böjn. (grad:avh. 19), Läsebok i sv. litt. f. komm. mellansk. (26), Sv. litt. efter 1900 (29), Skoluppl. av sv. förf. arb. (Tegnér, Geijer, Almquist m. fl), medarb. i Sv. akad. ordbok 14-16, red. av Rotary-Nord. RNO.
translated: Lindblad, Gustaf (Gösta) Fredrik, Ph.D., Associate Professor, Halmstad, b. 4/3/88 in Nässja, Östergötland, 1st child of engineer Carl Otto L. and Clara Blycker. Married on the 21st with Signe Helgesson. Children: Inge b. 22, Torgny b. 26, Kerstin b. 28. — Passed student examination in Hälsingborg in 1906, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1910, Master of Arts in 1912, Licentiate in 1914, Doctor of Philosophy in 1919. Traveled to Germany in 1912 and 1914. Teacher at Lund's private primary school and Lund's complete secondary school from 1919-1921, appointed lecturer at Hudiksvall higher school in 1920, principal at Eslöv higher secondary school from 1921-1930, lecturer at Halmstad higher school from 1930. Examiner for lower secondary school leaving examination there. Temporary scientific assistant at Lund University Library from 1912-1915, curator of the Hälsingborg-Landskrona Nature Club in Lund from 1912-1913, inspector for Eslöv city vocational school from 1923-1931, member of the board for the Committee of Middle School Principals from 1923-1929, chairman from 1924-1929, chairman of the Eslöv Gymnastics Association from 1921-1931, board member of the Skåne Gymnastics Association from 1928-1931, member of the board for the Eslöv city library from 1928-1931, chairman from 1929-1931, member of the board for the central library in Halmstad since 1932, chairman from 1937, chairman of the Halmstad Humanities Association from 1934, vice chairman of the Norden Association in Halmstad since 1943. President of Halmstad Rotary Club from 1944-1945. Works: "Abr. Sahlstedt and Swedish Substantive Declension" (thesis, 1919), "Reader in Swedish Literature for Middle School Students" (1926), "Swedish Literature after 1900" (1929), School Editions of Swedish Author Works (Tegnér, Geijer, Almquist, among others), collaborator in the Swedish Academy Dictionary from 1914-1916, editor of Rotary-Nordic (RNO).

publications.name: Abr. Sahlstedt and Swedish Substantive Declension
